reference.shortdesc: The synnote element contains a note (similar to a footnote) within a syntax definition group or fragment.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The syntax note explains aspects of the syntax that cannot be expressed in the markup itself.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The note will appear at the bottom of the syntax diagram instead of at the bottom of the page.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The synnote is specialized from fn. It is defined in the syntax diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.
